greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - x^3) * (1 - x^4) / ((1 - x) * (1 - x^6)) in powers of x.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, -1).
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2)) where f(u, v) = u^2 * (2*v - 1) - (3*v - 2) * (2*u - 1).
a(n) is multiplicative with a(3^e) = 0^e, a(2^e) = -(-1)^e if e>0, a(p^e) = 1 if p == 1 (mod 6), a(p^e) = (-1)^e if p == 5 (mod 6).
a(-n) = -a(n) unless n=0. a(n+3) = -a(n) unless n=0 or n=-3.
G.f.: (1 + x^2) / (1 - x + x^2). - Corrected by _Bruno Berselli_, Apr 06 2011
A128834(n) = a(n) unless n=0. A163810(n) = -a(n) unless n=0. A163804(n) = (-1)^n * a(n). Convolution inverse of A163805.
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1,1]; [1] cat [n le 2 select I[n] else Self(n-1) - Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 15 2018
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 04 2009
